mapper.select: select s.s_num as s_num, s_shopurl, s_sname, s_age, s_image, a.s_rank as s_rank from shoppingmall s, adshoppingmall a where s.s_num = a.s_num order by s_rank desc
select 35*count(f_num) from adshoppingmall m, favorite f where m.s_num = f.s_num(+) group by m.s_num order by m.s_num
select 20*count(hit_num) from adshoppingmall m, hitcount h where m.s_num =h.s_num(+) group by m.s_num order by m.s_num
select s_rank from adshoppingmall order by s_num
mapper.update: update adshoppingmall set s_rank = #{s_rank} where s_num = #{s_num}
